eula_en_1: {\rtf1\ansi\b1NiceHash QuickMiner End User Agreement\b0\line\line Dear user! You are about to start using NiceHash QuickMiner: \line \bullet You will share computing power of your PC and for that, you will be paid accordingly in cryptocurrency Bitcoin (BTC). \line \bullet This may result in battery life shortage of your device and increased electricity consumption. \line \line How does it work: https://www.nicehash.com \line What is cryptocurrency: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cryptocurrency \line \line Do you accept the terms?}
